resources.string: Set the interval at which the device settings are scanned
Turning on USB Debuggin can allow for malicious code to run on your phone. It is recommended you turn OFF this feature.
Your phone and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. It is recommended you turn OFF this feature.
Change the current password for the Application Locker
View and Edit Blocked USSD Codes
Numbers which you want to block
No. of tries before wiping the data
This number will be used to send the location cordinates. You need to enable this in order to get current location of your device
Enter a number that should be used to send location data, in case phone gets lost
Opting for this service you will be able to lock your phone in case your phone gets out of the perimeter range set by you. This will protect you privacy protect access to your phone without password

This will wipe your phone data in case a certain number of password attempts go wrong. Be careful to opt for this service. You could loose your data. This will also be activated only when you go out of the perimeter range
Your phone will start making sound as soon as it goes out of the perimeter range so to let you know someone is stealing it.
This will let you receive your device\'s current location on a secure number set by you in the settings. Be sure to set the number before opting for this service.
Select the interval with which the device\'s current location should be sent.
Enable remote lock, this will allow you to lock your device by sending a secret code message.
Enable/disable remote wipe, this will let you wipe your data by sending a secret code message.
Enable/disable remote location, this will send your devices current location if secret code message is received.

Enter a secret code which will be used to enable the remote lock, remote wipe and remote location org.owasp.seraphimdroid.services. Careful the code should not be a usual word cause it could trigger the remote org.owasp.seraphimdroid.services and could wipe your data unexpectedly.
Secret code to lock enable remote org.owasp.seraphimdroid.services
Long pressing the application will uninstall the application.

This will scan all your installed applications for permission they use. These permissions allow apps to use certain mobile features which could be harmful if not used correctly. The Permission Scanner will alert you about those dangerous applications and provide you with the malicious details.
This will scan your settings and check for options that are not set to their recommended state. You can click on the settings option to change it to the respective optimal state.
This contains all the logs to your blocked calls, malicious SMSes and USSDs. You can find the reason for the blocking and call blocked numbers from here.
The Application Locker will provide you with the ability to lock application. You will be prompt for password if you try to open that app.
The Service Locker will provide you with the ability to lock org.owasp.seraphimdroid.services. You will be prompt for password if you try to turn on/off that service.

Geo fencing let you set a perimeter for your phone. If the phone gets out of the perimeter it will perform actions like locking your phone, wiping you data(Ofcourse only if you choose so) and make an alert sound. You could also ask for location updates if you want.
